metadata.name: Mouse Departure
metadata.description:
"Faerie Tails" is a series of 1/1 short animations.
The illustrations and paintings are handmade, on paper, and put together with a short story and music.

MOUSE DEPARTURE
The humans had left the forest destroyed. Mouse had nowhere to go. The family decided to stay, but it was time to leave. To search for a safe place and build a future.  

On their adventure, Mouse met many new friends and even some foes. The mountains were high and the valleys were deep. But nothing could stop them on their journey.  

And then one day, on the horizon. A boat on the horizon. "Who could it be?" thought Mouse.

ABOUT
Art by Worthy Treasures, pastel on A4 paper.
Music by ZakharValaha
